timeline.message: Hydra auth server api flow changes.
OrgId removed
URLs structure changes and moved auth client id to properties file

timeline.bodyText: The changes in this file do not seem to be related to the auth server integration, please remove all unrelated changes. Maybe add them to a follow up PR
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: This is part of auth server integration because user can signin even they try to join the study.
replies.author: naveenr-btc

timeline.bodyText: can this be moved to a shared method?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Not all the auth server apis requires this header so we're are passing like this.
replies.author: naveenr-btc

timeline.bodyText: This code is repeated all through the android code. Consider extracting setting common headers into a shared method?
timeline.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText:
why is client_id a url?
shouldn't it be coming from the build configs instead?
timeline.author: zohrehj

timeline.message: AuthClientId modified to HydraClientId and moved to property file
Removed old auth server unused code

1.RefreshToken changed to TokenData
2.SignIn flow for StudyActivity updated
TestCases added for Auth Apis
Api changes implemented

timeline.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: should the code fail if getIntent is null? or invalid?
